attributes.action: Sack MP Peter Lilley from Commons Energy Committee
attributes.additional_details:
Peter Lilley has been accused of lying and making deliberately misleading statements regarding fracking on national television (Channel 4 news 26/1/14). He also has a conflict of interest as he is employed by Cayman Islands-based oil and gas company Tethys Petroleum.
We demand that he be removed from his post on the Commons Energy Committee and any cabinet position.
